== Cherpu (CT) (627862) ==

Cherpu (CT) is a town in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 7.79 sq. km. and harbouring 1847 households with total population of 7864 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 6 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 297 km. Male population is 3691 and female population is 4173. Scheduled Caste population is 1227 and Scheduled Tribes population is 1. Census Location Code of the town is 627862<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 6 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 86 km. Railway station is at Thrissur at a distance of 6 km.
